video.title: Roseanne Collection
video.synopsis: The unconventional parenting methods of Roseanne and Dan Conner generate laughs as the couple navigates the ups and downs of blue-collar life.

episodes.synopsis: When Roseanne finds a bag of pot, David takes the blame, thinking he's covering for Darlene. Roseanne and Dan reminisce about their wilder days.
episodes.title: A Stash from the Past

episodes.synopsis: Fred gets jealous when Jackie calls Dan for help instead of him, and they both have second thoughts about going through with their wedding.
episodes.title: Altar Egos

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne and Dan go to great lengths trying to conceive. Jackie stops by with a pregnancy test for Roseanne -- and some big news.
episodes.title: Be My Baby

episodes.synopsis: Bev fractures her pelvis in the retirement home and guilts Roseanne and Dan into letting her stay with them. As always, she drives everyone crazy.
episodes.title: Body by Jake

episodes.synopsis: Dan tries to help Becky and Mark work through a rough spot in their relationship. Roseanne finds out that David and Darlene are living together.
episodes.title: Busted

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne's been enjoying blackmailing David, but David's ready to come clean to Dan about living with Darlene. Meanwhile, Jackie pushes Fred away.
episodes.title: David vs. Goliath

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne's the life of the party when she and a pregnant Jackie go to a gay bar with Nancy and Nancy's new girlfriend.
episodes.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell

episodes.synopsis: Jackie finds out that Fred is suing her for custody of the baby, and Dan feels bad when he learns he's the one who inadvertently gave Fred the idea.
episodes.title: Don't Make Room for Daddy

episodes.synopsis: Darlene gets an unexpectedly warm welcome from Dan -- until he learns that she's not the only one who's been keeping him in the dark.
episodes.title: Everyone Comes to Jackie's

episodes.synopsis: Jackie grills Dan when she finds out he had lunch with a high school fling, and they both have trouble keeping it a secret from Roseanne.
episodes.title: Guilt by Imagination

episodes.synopsis: Darlene tells Roseanne she's skipping the Halloween party at the lodge because she has a date. Nancy worries that Dan doesn't like her.
episodes.title: Halloween V

episodes.synopsis: When Becky and Mark come home for a visit, Dan worries that Roseanne's issues with Mark are going to spoil his big football reunion party.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne gives David some tough love when he agonizes over Darlene. Dan has a talk with D.J. about a very delicate subject.
episodes.title: Homeward Bound

episodes.synopsis: Darlene spies on D.J. and learns he's secretly been going to church. Newly religious D.J. confronts Roseanne about lies she's told.
episodes.title: I Pray the Lord My Stove to Keep

episodes.synopsis: David's old-fashioned opinions about having kids land him in hot water with Darlene. Roseanne gives Fred advice about proposing to Jackie.
episodes.title: Isn't It Romantic

episodes.synopsis: Jackie says she wants Fred in the delivery room instead of Roseanne. When Jackie's water breaks, Roseanne's in no rush to get her to the hospital.
episodes.title: Labor Day

episodes.synopsis: Dan's mother is admitted to a mental institution. Haunted by childhood memories, Dan lashes out at Roseanne and goes out to confront Ed.
episodes.title: Lies My Father Told Me

episodes.synopsis: Jackie dodges Fred after a one-night stand. Roseanne tries to get Darlene and David to make up, and Darlene catches D.J. skipping school.
episodes.title: Party Politics

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne and Dan debate what to do when Ed misses an alimony payment. Fred asks Jackie how many men she's slept with -- and doesn't like the answer.
episodes.title: Past Imperfect

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne goes to a women's association meeting to do some networking. Dan catches Mark drinking at the Lobo when he's supposed to be in class.
episodes.title: Suck Up or Shut Up

episodes.synopsis: The Conners' Thanksgiving is even more dysfunctional than usual when Nana Mary reveals a secret about Bev and Dan blows up at Mark.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving '93

episodes.synopsis: Leon undermines Roseanne's authority at the Lunch Box. Roseanne flies off the handle when D.J. takes the family car out for a joyride.
episodes.title: The Driver's Seat

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne and Jackie try to figure out a way to fire Bev from the Lunch Box. Roseanne says she'll bite the bullet if Jackie asks out Dan's friend Fred.
episodes.title: The Mommy's Curse

episodes.synopsis: While Roseanne mopes about Darlene going away to school in Chicago, David takes drastic measures to try to keep her around.
episodes.title: Two Down, One to Go

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne and Dan defy the neighborhood association's ban on tacky Christmas decorations. D.J. finds out that David and Darlene are living together.
episodes.title: White Trash Christmas

episodes.synopsis: A fortune-teller gives young Roseanne and Jackie a glimpse of their future, and a grown-up D.J. reflects on his life during a therapy session.
episodes.title: All About Rosey: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne gets advice from legendary TV moms like Barbara Billingsley from "Leave It to Beaver" and June Lockhart from "Lost in Space."
episodes.title: All About Rosey: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne tells everyone that the doctor put her on bed rest for a week. Jackie lays down the law when a meddling Bev offers to babysit.
episodes.title: Bed and Bored

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne's nesting instincts send her on a home improvement spree. The Conners realize their dream of becoming a Nielsen family.
episodes.title: Couch Potatoes

episodes.synopsis: David's dating again, but he's heartbroken when he learns that Darlene's moving in with Jimmy. D.J. tries to get out of working at the Lunch Box.
episodes.title: Follow the Son

episodes.synopsis: Jackie gossips about Becky and Mark's dwindling sex life to Roseanne, who then tells Dan. Roseanne encourages David to get out and date.
episodes.title: Girl Talk

episodes.synopsis: Becky and Mark move into a trailer park. Dan and Roseanne offer to help them out financially, but Becky and Mark want to make it on their own.
episodes.title: Happy Trailers

episodes.synopsis: Dan and Roseanne try to get Fred to go back to Jackie. But she's having second thoughts about their relationship.
episodes.title: Husbands and Wives

episodes.synopsis: David flirts with the Lunch Box's new waitress, but she's got her eye on Mark. Fred gets advice from Dan when Jackie wants to spice up their sex life.
episodes.title: Lost Youth

episodes.synopsis: Tension builds between Roseanne and Dan as they anxiously await critical test results, and Jackie steps in to defend her sister.
episodes.title: Maybe Baby

episodes.synopsis: When Bev gets busted for drinking and driving, she realizes she's an alcoholic. Roseanne bans booze from the house -- and it's Super Bowl Sunday.
episodes.title: My Name Is Bev

episodes.synopsis: The Conner house is bursting at the seams, and Dan thinks it's time for Mark and Becky to move out. Jackie goes overboard worrying about Andy.
episodes.title: Nine Is Enough

episodes.synopsis: Dan tries to teach D.J. how to defend himself against a bully. Roseanne and Jackie pay a surprise visit to Darlene on parents' day and meet Jimmy.
episodes.title: Punch and Jimmy

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne and Dan spy on their new nudist neighbors. Mark enlists Darlene's help when Becky and David start spending lots of time together.
episodes.title: Rear Window

episodes.synopsis: Darlene is upset when David decides to spend a month in Europe. Dan and Roseanne daydream about being shipwrecked on a deserted island.
episodes.title: Sherwood Schwartz: A Loving Tribute

episodes.synopsis: When Dan sees Jackie hanging out with another man at the Lobo, he debates whether to tell Fred and asks Mark and David for advice.
episodes.title: Single Married Female

episodes.synopsis: Jackie and Fred want to see less of D.J., but Roseanne gets defensive when Jackie brings it up. Dan tries to broker peace between Becky and Darlene.
episodes.title: Sisters

episodes.synopsis: The whole gang attends Leon's gay Halloween soiree, where a lot of the guys seem to know Fred. Roseanne and Jackie suspect that Bev is bald.
episodes.title: Skeleton in the Closet

episodes.synopsis: Mark doesn't want David spending so much time with Becky. The plot thickens when David has an erotic dream and Becky thinks it was about her.
episodes.title: Sleeper

episodes.synopsis: An angry David spills a secret about Darlene that undermines Dan and Roseanne's trust in her, and they lay down the law.
episodes.title: Snoop Davey Dave

episodes.synopsis: Nana Mary shows up for Thanksgiving with a new husband. Roseanne and Dan worry that something's wrong with the baby.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving 1994

episodes.synopsis: Roseanne tries to get David and Darlene back together, and she interrogates David when she finds out he has a date with another girl.
episodes.title: The Birds and the Frozen Bees

episodes.synopsis: A couples therapy session gives Jackie and Fred insight into their differences. D.J. goes on a date with a bossy girl who's a big hit with Roseanne.
episodes.title: The Blaming of the Shrew

episodes.synopsis: When D.J. struggles to keep up in school, Dan loses confidence in his parenting skills. But it turns out that D.J. has an embarrassing problem.
episodes.title: The Parenting Trap

episodes.synopsis: When Jackie spots Darlene and David's car outside a motel, Roseanne confronts them. Dan's nervous about having another baby.
episodes.title: Two for One
